CustomField.formula: IF (TEXT(Reviewed_within_allotted_time__c) = "No",5,0) + IF (TEXT(All_Information_Requested__c ) = "No",15,0) + IF (TEXT( Acknowledgment_email_sent_within_SLA__c ) = "No",5,0) + IF (TEXT( Sent_to_Retro_or_UW_within_24_hours__c) = "No",5,0) + IF (TEXT( Bill_Hold_PS_Issue_Flag_Fillped__c ) = "No",3,0) + IF (TEXT(Salesforce_Setup_and_System_Note__c) = "No",1,0) + IF (TEXT(Native_System_Work_Correct__c) = "No",15,0) + IF (TEXT( Risk_Reallocation_Ran__c ) = "No",5,0) + IF (Text(Member_Impacted_by_Change_Noted__c) = "No",3,0) + IF (TEXT( Notional_Bill_Compared_to_Last__c ) = "No",10,0) + IF (TEXT( Production_Bill_Compared_to_Notational__c ) = "No",15,0) + IF (TEXT( Bill_Hold_Removed_After_Bill_Ran__c ) = "No",10,0) + IF (TEXT( M_B_Notified_of_Massive_Billing_Chg__c ) = "No",3,0) + IF (TEXT( Amendment_Created_Completed__c ) = "No",10,0) + IF (TEXT( Complete_Explanation_Sent_to_Customer__c ) = "No",15,0) + IF (TEXT( All_Parties_Kept_Informed__c ) = "No",5,0) + IF (TEXT( Regenerated_Documents_Compared_Existing__c ) = "No",15,0) + IF (TEXT ( Sent_to_Claims__c ) = "No",3,0) + IF (TEXT( Salesforce_Notes_Stay_Current_Closed__c ) = "No",3,0) + IF (TEXT ( Regular_Follow_ups_Sent_fr_Information__c) = "No",3,0) + IF (TEXT ( Responded_to_Questions_within_24_hours__c) = "No",3,0)
CustomField.label: Old Research Points Missed
